title: Andy Samberg
summary: Andy Samberg (born David A. J. Samberg;[1] August 18, 1978)[2] is an American comedian, actor, writer, producer, and musician. He is a member of the comedy music group the Lonely Island and was a cast member on Saturday Night Live from 2005 to 2012, where he and his fellow group members are credited with popularizing the SNL Digital Shorts.[3]
